message.content:
cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.DB, cs.SI. 

The paper discusses a recommendation approach that utilizes semantic annotation of user reviews and linked data to extract useful information about items to recommend. This involves natural language processing (NLP) techniques and knowledge graphs such as DBpedia and Wikidata. Therefore, the paper is likely to belong to the Information Retrieval (cs.IR), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), Computational Linguistics (cs.CL), Database (cs.DB), and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) sub-categories.
